name: travel_delays
rows: Crash on I-78 eastbound at Exit 55: PA 29 - CEDAR CREST BOULEVARD. There is a lane restriction.
I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD
Roadwork on I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD both directions between Exit: BEDFORD AV /+ MARIO LEMIEUX PL and Exit: HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE. All lanes closed.
Incident cleared on US 22 westbound 0 miles EAST of Exit: US 11 NORTH. There are residual delays.
Roadwork on HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE both directions between Exit: MAZEROSKI WY /+ PNC PARK/HEINZ FIELD and Exit: LC TO PERRY HW. All lanes closed.
Crash on I-95 southbound between .7 miles south of Exit 32: ACADEMY ROAD/LINDEN AVE and 1.2 miles north of Exit 30: COTTMAN AVE/RHAWN ST. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on US 22 eastbound 3 miles WEST of Exit: PA 333 - THOMPSONTOWN/EAST SALEM. All lanes now open.
Crash on GREENVILLE PK / GREENVILLE AV both directions at REINHARD VILLAGES, REINHARD VILLAGES DR. There is a traffic disruption.
Disabled vehicle on US 202 northbound at KING OF PRUSSIA MALL, MALL BL, SHAFFER RD. There is a lane restriction.
Disabled vehicle on I-81 southbound .4 miles north of Exit 69: PROGRESS AVENUE. There is a shoulder closed.
Vehicle recovery/follow up on I-80 eastbound between .2 miles east of Exit 111: PA 153 - CLEARFIELD and 1.5 miles east of Exit 111: PA 153 - CLEARFIELD. There is a lane restriction.
Utility work on PA 65 both directions between ALLEN ST and PEARSON ST. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on PA 660 both directions between SR 0362 SH and BENAUER RD. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on I-83 southbound .7 miles south of Exit 48: UNION DEPOSIT ROAD. There is a shoulder closed.
Roadwork on I-279 northbound between Exit: EVERGREEN ROAD and Mile Post: 4.5. There is a lane restriction.
LITTLE HICKORY RD / NEBRASKA RD / GUITONVILLE RD
Flooding on LITTLE HICKORY RD / NEBRASKA RD / GUITONVILLE RD both directions between GERMAN HILL RD and SR 3005 SAGE RD. All lanes closed.
Crash on I-376 westbound 1 miles WEST of Exit 64A: I-79 SOUTH - WASHINGTON. There is a traffic disruption.
POPLAR RUN RD / CLINTON RD / WHITE RD / BEAR ROCKS RD
Downed tree in wires on POPLAR RUN RD / CLINTON RD / WHITE RD / BEAR ROCKS RD both directions between PRINKEY RD and DUNBAUGH RD. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on PA 130 westbound 0 miles WEST of CEDAR ST. There is a lane restriction.
Flooding on PA 381 both directions between CLUB STABLE RD and LINCOLN HW. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on I-80 eastbound between .9 miles east of Exit 53: PA 338 - KNOX and .5 miles east of Exit : WEIGH STATION EAST RD. There is a shoulder closed.
BEELER ST / SOUTH DALLAS AV / WILKINS AV / FORBES AV
Roadwork on BEELER ST / SOUTH DALLAS AV / WILKINS AV / FORBES AV westbound between BEELERMONT PL and CARNEGIE MELLON UNIV, FORBES AV. All lanes closed.
BEELER ST / SOUTH DALLAS AV / WILKINS AV / FORBES AV
Roadwork on BEELER ST / SOUTH DALLAS AV / WILKINS AV / FORBES AV eastbound between CARNEGIE MELLON UNIV, FORBES AV and WILKINS AV. All lanes closed.
Road work on I-76 East. Shoulders are closed.

Flooding on LINGLE AV both directions between (LANCASTER County Line)+ NORTHSIDE DR and OATFIELD LN. All lanes closed.
